_description: A mock dream vision, bawdy — fragment of eighteen lines only, in couplets

Old menaleus one a dayeAs in feild this sheppard
                    laye…
CULEe437.Last Lines:
…vppe I starte fourth wentwith her face [ ]
                    Confeede[nt]
